items.content_html: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

items.content_html: A sleek and modern developer portfolio built with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn/UI, designed to showcase skills, projects, and experience in an optimized and responsive layout. items.content_html: A lightweight, serverless image processing tool built with AWS Lambda and Sharp. It automatically resizes images uploaded to an S3 bucket and saves the optimized output to a destination bucket—scalable, efficient, and fully cloud-native.
